sentence.Network_en: For once, the powerful pocket - handkerchief failed.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一次, 那块神通广大的手绢居然不灵验了.

sentence.Network_en: Charles drew from his pocket handkerchief embroidered by the great lady who was travelling in Scotland.
sentence.Network_cn: 查理从口袋中掏出一条手帕,是在苏格兰游历的阔太太绣的.

sentence.Network_en: He used his white linen pocket handkerchief and held it against his lips.
sentence.Network_cn: 他用他的白色亚麻便携手帕,把它捂在他的嘴上.
